parser

类 Grammer

  • java.lang.Object
    • parser.Grammer

  • class Grammer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to represent the grammer that the calculator is based on. A grammer consists of productions.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      private java.util.ArrayList<parser.production.Production> productions 

    • 构造器概要

      Constructor to initialize the grammer by adding productions.

        public parser.production.Production get(int index)
        Get the specific production indexed by index
        参数:

        返回:
        the production indexed by index
